alumni_club.events_details:
1. Within the activities of the Board of Trustees of AUES, a discussion was held on issues directly affecting all higher education institutions in Kazakhstan, including our university. The current issues facing the university and the country include a shortage of personnel in the industry and workforce training. Electricity and Thermal Energy Today. The discussion involved Turganov D.N., Member of the Mazhilis of the Parliament of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Tyutebayev S.S., former Chairman of the Board of Samruk-Energo JSC, Serikov E.A., Professor of the Thermal Power Engineering Department, and other industry specialists.

2. A solemn reception in honor of Energy Day took place at Energo University on December 22, 2023. During the event, industrial partners of the university, including many graduates of Energo University, and teachers who made a personal contribution to the development of the university and the training of personnel for the energy industry, were awarded letters of appreciation.

3. The tradition of meetings between industry practitioners and the current generation of students is continued by the Institute of Automation and Information Technologies of Energo University â€“ the Almaty University of Energy and Communications named after Gumarbek Daukeev.

4. On January 27, a meeting was held at Energo University (Almaty University of Energy and Communications named after Gumarbek Daukeev) with graduates of 2001-2002. Students of PEk-97-1 and PEk-96-1 (industrial electronics) came to reminisce about their youth.

5. On February 12, as part of the development of the Alumni club ENERGY movement at Energo University (Almaty University of Energy and Communications named after Gumarbek Daukeev), a meeting was held between a graduate of previous years, engineer-designer of Uni Grand Engineering LLP Shyngysa Nurbolatova, and today's students of our university.

6. On February 24, at Energo University, within the development of the Alumni club movement, two events took place: a meeting of graduates of 2005 from the Electrical Engineering Faculty and a five-year anniversary meeting of graduates of the specialty Â«Safety of Life Activity and Environmental ProtectionÂ».

7. Students of the 3-4 courses of the Institute of Energy and Green Technologies of Energo University (Almaty University of Energy and Communications) met with the founder and director of business strategic development of Supros engineering & Supply, a graduate of our university, Sanat Aktanhanov. The event was organized by the Department of Thermal Power Engineering.

QADataset.student:
Answers to the most frequently asked questions:

1. The cost of 1 loan in an additional semester?
---------------------------------------
 The cost of 1 loan for the 2023-2024 academic year is 16,000 tenge.

2. How many credits are allowed to take in an additional semester?
---------------------------------------
 In the additional semester, it is allowed to take no more than 15 credits.

3. With what GPA can I switch from course to course?
---------------------------------------
 - first year of study â€“ 1.0
- second year of study â€“ 1.3
- The third year of study is 1.6

4. I have academic and financial debt. Will I be expelled from the university?
---------------------------------------
 Through Platonus, in the section Applications, information support, services, Appendix 2 or Appendix 4.

5. A certificate is required for the allowance in the PSC for a large family. How do I get it?
---------------------------------------
 Through Platonus, in the Applications section, Information support, services, Appendix 29 or Appendix 6

6. You need a certificate for the military enlistment office â€“ how do I get it?
---------------------------------------
 Through Platonus, in the section Applications, information support, services, Appendix 3 and in it you need check the military enlistment office

7. What documents do I need to provide when applying for an academic leave?
---------------------------------------
1) A certificate and a summons from the military enlistment office.
2) A certificate of VCC from 6 months to 1 year.
3) The child's birth certificate.

Detailed questions and answers can be found [here](https://aues.edu.kz/ru/question-answear)
